experience.title: Machine Learning Intern | InStore Vision
experience.description: â€¢ Worked on Person Re-identification problem to identify / re-identify people in real time and tag them with unique labels.â€¢ Proposed a new loss function called cluster loss for deep CNN architectures motivated from triplet-loss.â€¢ Cluster Loss learns feature representations of people in a class independent way, forming round and separated clusters of all the classes.â€¢ Improved the Rank-1 accuracy by 3% and mAP by 6% compared to the existing methods on two popular accessible datasets.
experience.description_html: â€¢ Worked on Person Re-identification problem to identify / re-identify people in real time and tag them with unique labels.â€¢ Proposed a new loss function called cluster loss for deep CNN architectures motivated from triplet-loss.â€¢ Cluster Loss learns feature representations of people in a class independent way, forming round and separated clusters of all the classes.â€¢ Improved the Rank-1 accuracy by 3% and mAP by 6% compared to the existing methods on two popular accessible datasets. <!---->

courses: [{"subtitle":"-","title":"Algorithms 6.006 | MIT OpenCourseWare"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"Machine Learning | Coursera"},{"subtitle":"-","title":"cs231n: Convolutional Neural Networks for Visual Recognition | Stanford University"}]
publications: [{"title":"Cluster Loss for Person Re-Identification","subtitle":"ACM International Conference Proceedings Series (ICVGIP 2018)","date":"December 19, 2018","description":"Person re-identification (ReID) is an important problem in com-puter vision, especially for video surveillance applications. Theproblem focuses on identifying people across different cameras oracross different frames of same camera. The main challenge lies inidentifying similarity of the same person against large appearanceand structure variations, while differentiating between individuals.Recently, deep learning networks with triplet loss has become acommon framework for person ReID. However, triplet loss focuseson obtaining correct orders on the training set. We demonstrate thatit performs inferior in a clustering task. In this paper, we design acluster loss, which can lead to the model output with a larger inter-class variation and a smaller intra-class variation compared to thetriplet loss. As a result, our model has a better generalisation abilityand can achieve a higher accuracy on the test set especially for aclustering task. We also introduce a batch hard training mechanismfor improving the results and faster convergence of training."}]
patents: [{"title":"Selective Analysis For Field Boundary Detection","date_issued":"July 19, 2022","patents_id":"US11393194B2","description":"A method for selective boundary detection includes identifying a plurality of boundariesfor a plurality of subregions in a region of interest utilizing one or more multispectral images forthe region of interest. The method further includes analyzing a plurality of adjacent fields to afirst field in a first subregion out of the plurality of subregions utilizing a region identificationcriterion based on a plurality of attributes for the first field and the plurality of adjacent fields.The method further includes determining, based on the analyzing, the first region with the firstfield requires further analysis of multitemporal remote sensed data over a defined period of time."}]

projects.title: An Online Opinion Poll Portal
projects.description: -- Built an online opinion poll portal for the candidates running for the general elections of Technology Students Gymkhana, IIT Kharagpur with their profile and proposals to compare with-- Received a huge response from the students in the campus and site got 10k+ hits in just 3 days

projects.title: Continual Learning | Bachelor Thesis | Guide : Prof. Pabitra Mitra
projects.description: â€¢ Built a multi-task learning python framework which can learn new tasks without forgetting the earlier ones, replicating humans.â€¢ Implemented and fused several existing works to find the one having the least catastrophic forgetting over the full learning timeline.â€¢ Methods were based on cutting edge works like distillation loss, generative networks, and weight consolidation.â€¢ Formulated experiments by splitting CIFAR-100 dataset into 5 independent tasks having 20 classes each.

projects.title: Human Personality Detection | Guide : Prof. Pabitra Mitra
projects.description: â€¢ Implemented a paper proposing Deep Bi-modal Regression Network to predict â€™big five personality traitsâ€™ of people from their short introductory videos using TensorFlow (well known standardized personality profiling used for hiring).

projects.title: CNN-from-scratch
projects.description: â€¢ Implemented a simple CNN architecture from scratch using only Numpy.â€¢ Most popular repository for the ground up implementation of CNNs.

projects.title: CNN-from-Scratch
projects.description: A scratch implementation of Convolutional Neural Network in Python using only numpy and validated over CIFAR-10 & MNIST Dataset

honors_and_awards.title: GOLD in OpenSoft, Technology General Championship 2018-19
honors_and_awards.description: â€¢ Led a team of 15+ members as a Captain and secured GOLD in the OpenSoft, Technology General Championship 2018-19, a prestigious annual technology competition organised among halls of residences of IIT Kharagpur. â€¢ Designed a natural language search engine for lawyers and ordinary people where they can search for legal acts and previous court cases. â€¢ Integrated sub-modules like case summarizer, search domain reduction, semantic sentence embedding model, query type detector, etc

honors_and_awards.title: WINNER of Safety Data Analytics Challenge, Great Step IIT Kharagpur
honors_and_awards.description: Won the challenge by successfully minimising the cost of customer retention & acquisition of a telecom company by accurately predicting its probable customer churning.

honors_and_awards.title: RUNNER UP in Capillary Data Science Challenge
honors_and_awards.description: â€¢ Successfully modelled a movie recommendation system with Biased Matrix Factorization method using Tensorflow. â€¢ Achieved state-of-the-art result on 1-M Movielens dataset securing 2nd position on the challenge leaderboard.

honors_and_awards.title: Gold in OpenSoft, Technology General Championship, IIT Kharagpur
honors_and_awards.description: -- Contributed in developing an Ethereum based decentralized photo sharing application using EmbarkJS framework and decentralised storage IPFS -- Integrated the backend API for the app using Javascript along with Google Maps API for location based tagging

honors_and_awards.title: 2nd Runner Up in Microsoft Code.fun.do Hackathon 2017
honors_and_awards.description: â€¢ Secured 2nd Runner Up position out of 200+ teams in the overnight hackathon organised by Microsoft. â€¢ Developed a messenger bot which can respond to people on railway queries like the status of trains, their routes, PNR status, etc. â€¢ Integrated Microsoft APIs for language understanding capabilities and built a data scraper for real-time railway information.
